claw struck him, but Gigas didn't move. Beholder 2 and Grenade are both bow=
led over by the energy ball. Horn Drill jumps in the air and backflips, hap=
py that he again came through for the Mini-Mafia. Gigas looks down at Razor=
claw. (Judging by the size of the Razorclaw figure and the fact that Gigas =
is a large, Ultra sized bot, like Depth Charge) Gigas swings a huge punch a=
t Razorclaw...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nb=
wrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, December 17, 2000 11:31 AM
  Subject: Re:=
 Cross Fire


  Gigas was huge, and RazorThe first missle strikes a rock se=
nding shrapnel into Ice. Her thick hide took most of the abuse but she did =
have cuts and scratches. the second hit in front of her feat forcing her ba=
ck. dust and dirt temporarily impaired her senses but her mental abilities =
warned her of the others intentions. Ice transforms to Owl mode and launche=
s herself skyward out of the way of the wave beam. She flew toward Razor Cl=
aw planning to use his shield to protect her too. Horn Drills shots strike =
her before she can get to safety, she plumets to the ground transforming to=
 her sort of robot mode before hitting. She tried to control her pain but h=
er emotions soon turned to fear. She tried to use her telekinetic powers to=
 deflect the other blast but couldn't find anything solid to grab hold of. =
the blast was ready to hit her when it suddenly disipated. Ice opened her e=
yes and saw a ball of energy in front of her, thinking it was another blast=
 heading towards her she yells in terror "Get away from me." the ball of ne=
gative ionic energy hurtled toward Grenade and Beholder2.

  Razor Claw saw=
 Ice go down and rushed to her side. Seeing she was alright he charged at G=
igas head firs in a ramming attempt.
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    =
From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, December 15, 2=
000 8:17 PM
    Subject: Re: Cross Fire


    Kracken aimed at Ice.

    Kr=
acken: Yo! That one will be good!

    Kracken fires 2 missiles at Ice. Gig=
as fires his wave beams at Ice. Horn Drill fires at Ice, Grenade and Behold=
er 2 join their blasted together into one, both of them holding the large g=
un, and fire it at Ice...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: C=
YBERWOLF4 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, December 15, 2=
000 5:16 AM
      Subject: Re: Cross Fire


      Razor Claws knocked back =
after being caugh off gaurd by the first missle. He hits the ground leaving=
 a skid mark across the ground, He roared with pain as shrapnel from other =
missles hit around him. He rolled back to his feat creating his forcefield.=
 As long as his feat remained planted the shots wouldn't be able to penetra=
te. "Ice, Lunarpine, I've got them distracted, any time you'd like to join =
the fun, I'm ready to Party." He shouts over his comm. He knew that his tea=
mates had thier paws full no matter where they were.
        ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    =
    Sent: Thursday, December 14, 2000 9:39 AM
        Subject: Re: Cross Fi=
re


        The Mini-Mafia split back up again. Kracken sees Razorclaw.

 =
       Kracken: I won't ask. Hey! Look! Razorclaw! Good target, mob! Start =
with one, don't target another till he's done!

        Kracken fires 2 mis=
siles at Razorclaw. Horn Dril fires a drill missile, with the power of abou=
t 2 missiles because it's packed with acidic material and explosives and ju=
st waiting to explode, and he fired this single missile at Razorclaw. Gigas=
 fires a bolt of electricity from his hand at Razorclaw. Grenade shoots a f=
ireball at Razorclaw. Beholder 2 fires 3 beams, they travel in waves toward=
 Razorclaw...

cember 14, 2000 8:54 AM

taying in the air, he fired 15 shots from his pistol at Teltoli.

  Hellbat gets knocked out from the EMP.  Hearing what FZ said, Sharpedge o=
pens 
          up a comm to the Mafia:: 
          Sharpedge: Mafia, do no=

          weakened! Zardus=

          ::Treadshot transforms to tank mode and lobbed 2 missl=

          hears Klant's words::

Thats alright, well wait here till you ARE ready.
